history.proof: intros. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_lim_seq_geom.

exceptions.exn: In environment q : R H : Rabs q < 1 Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally 0 P -> filtermap (fun n : nat => ?M2363 ^ n) eventually P" with "exists l : Rbar, is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => q ^ n) l".

original: intros q Hq. apply is_lim_seq_geom. apply Hq.
